lead_paragraph: HSU--Ta Chun. Weill Cornell Medicine is saddened by the passing of our friend Ta Chun Hsu, former president of The Starr Foundation and a graceful, longtime generous champion of our institution. His legacy endures through the C.V. Starr Biomedical Information Center, which the foundation established in 1987 to provide physicians, scientists, staff and students with the latest information resources. The foundation's commitment to education is also exemplified in the C.V. Starr Scholarship, which has supported the training of generations of medical students since its creation nearly 30 years ago. We will greatly miss his friendship and sage advice. Our condolences to The Starr Foundation leadership, his family and his many friends. Dr. Laurie H. Glimcher, Dean, Weill Cornell Medicine Jessica M. Bibliowicz, Chairman, Board of Overseers 1/3
